name: Slimey Slimes
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can destroy 1 "Jam Breeding Machine" you control and 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, if you Special Summoned "Revival Jam" by its own effect, this turn, draw 3 cards.
